title: ETC test for GB elementary school teachers postponed
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 26 (APP): The Education Testing Council (ETC), Higher Education Commission has postponed the screening test for Gilgit Baltistanâ€™s Elementary School Teachers (ESTs/ BPS-14), scheduled for Sunday (July 28, 2024).
In this regard, ETC is also contacting the candidates individually to inform them about the postponement, said a press release on Friday.
The test has been delayed, till further orders, owing to a stay order in effect.
